1.title: #WatchThisDorff & #CookingWithJCam
1.plot: In this episode, we introduce you to the all new Scream Queen Stream: what it is and will be about, what the goals are for it, and host Jessica Cameron subjects Heather Dorff to some disturbing videos + her god awful cooking skills.

2.title: Amy Hoff Interview, Part 1
2.plot: In this episode, Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff talk with Scottish - based fantasy / science fiction director Amy Hoff about her book and web series Caledonia.

3.title: #JustSayNoDorff
3.plot: Our favorite special guest and power puff girl Dani Inks helps Jessica Cameron teach Dorff how to 'Just Say No' when a guy she's not interested in asks her out. Hilarity ensues in the form of bad male impersonations and penis jokes.

4.title: Amy Hoff Interview, Part 2
4.plot: In this episode, Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff continue to talk and drink with Scottish - based fantasy / science fiction director Amy Hoff about her book and web series Caledonia.

5.title: Live Stream
5.plot: Welcome to Scream Queen Stream LIVE broadcast. Hosts Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff will entertain you live with their wild antics - drinking games, free prize giveaways to Patrons on Patreon, answer fan questions, chat live, and more.

6.title: Ireland, Screamvention, & Scotland Adventures!
6.plot: On this episode of Scream Queen Stream, we feature some funny clips and snippets from our recent trip to Ireland/ Scotland for Screamvention. Featuring beautiful scenery, drunk Irish and Scottish guys, dancing predators, #drunkdorff, #tipsyJcam and more.

7.title: Barbie Wilde Interview and ScreamVention Prank
7.plot: Jessica Cameron interviews the lovely actress and indie horror author Barbie Wilde at ScreamVention - which they were both guests. Jessica then pulls a funny prank on her partner in crime Heather Dorff.

8.title: Learning to Cook with Jessica Cameron
8.plot: JCam decides to 'cook' for Heather some thing she has literally just made up. Madness and worry of fire ensues.

9.title: Drunk Cards Against Humanity
9.plot: In this 9th episode of Scream Queen Stream, Jessica Cameron, Heather Dorff, and our favorite guest Dani Inks play a few games of drunken cards against humanity. Find out who's the most disturbed.

10.title: Drunk Cards Against Humanity Part Two
10.plot: It's our 10th episode. See who wins the most Cards Against Humanity rounds and ultimately is the most badass at this game.

11.title: Childish Antics in Scotland
11.plot: Our girls (Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff) decide to try out a Scottish Playground - one that is much different from the standard American ones. Hilarity and silliness ensure.

12.title: Live Stream Personality Test
12.plot: Hosts Jessica Cameron & Heather Dorff will entertain you live with their wild antics - drinking games, personality test for Jessica Cameron, free prize giveaways to Patrons on Patreon, answer fan questions, chat live, and more!

13.title: Interview with Bastard Filmmakers
13.plot: Jessica Cameron gets a chance to sit down with up-and-coming indie film directors and writers of Bastard, Patrick Robert Young and Powell Robinson, to talk all things about how they got their start and the filming of bastard.

14.title: Drunk 5 Minute, No Mirror Make Up Challenge
14.plot: Our girls (Jessica Cameron, Heather Dorff) and guest Dani Inks attempt the No Mirror Makeup Challenge while also drunk. Needless to say the results are less then great but the process is funny to watch!

15.title: Jess Gets a Real Tarot Card Reading
15.plot: Jessica Cameron gets her fortune read by Dani's good friend Jessi the Spiritual Advisory. It's a bit of an emotional ride as she reads her cards, communicates with her deceased parents and more!

16.title: Directors of #IndieFilm "BASTARD" Interview, Part
16.plot: Heather Dorff gets a chance to finish the sit down with up-and-coming indie film directors and writers of Bastard, Patrick Robert Young and Powell Robinson, to talk all things about how they got their start and the filming of bastard.

17.title: Cooking with J Cam
17.plot: Heather shows Jess how to make her easy and made up version of bi bim bop. (Note it's not nearly as hard and therefore not nearly as good but still delicious). Watch as Jessica adds her own spin on this recipe, pepper not included!

18.title: WTF Dating Profile Pic Fails
18.plot: On this episode of Scream Queen Stream (Episode #18 ), we find ourselves posting some of the most hilarious, weird, and just downright creepy profile pics we've come across on dating sites.

19.title: Trolling Tinder
19.plot: ScreamQueens Jessica Cameron and Julianne Gabert convince Heather Dorff to join Tinder - hilarity ensues. Learn how to use Tinder, how NOT to use Tinder, what men are looking for and more! Is drinking while using Tinder a Good idea? Find out.

20.title: We Troll Tinder
20.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff continue to troll tinder - by messaging guys the most ridiculous stuff ever. Get a laugh at the responses.

21.title: 20 Questions with a Hot Scottish Actor
21.plot: Scottish actor Niall Flannigan plays 20 questions. You can bet that hosts Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff get personal - but Niall handles it like a champ using his ridiculous charisma and silliness.

22.title: Screamvention Women in Horror Panel with Barbie Wilde
22.plot: Cenobite and #IndieActress Barbie Wilde from Hellraiser 2, your favorite #IndieFilm #ScreamQueens Jessica Cameron, and Heather Dorff give a Women In Horror Month Panel / interview and Q and A on their thoughts of the film industry and women in it, among answering other questions, with a surprise appearance of the Candy Man himself, Tony Todd.

23.title: Screamvention Women in Horror Panel with Barbie Wilde - Part 2
23.plot: Cenobite and #IndieActress Barbie Wilde from Hellraiser 2, your favorite #IndieFilm #ScreamQueens Jessica Cameron, and Heather Dorff give a Women In Horror Month Panel / interview and Q and A on their thoughts of the film industry and women in it, among answering other questions, with a surprise appearance of the Candy Man himself, Tony Todd.

24.title: Behind the Scenes of the Horror Film Red Eye
24.plot: We feature footage and shenanigans of the Red Eye cast and crew while filming their feature horror / slasher in Kentucky, July 2016. Then watch as Heather Dorff dives drunk into a Walmart Ball pin as Walmart employees look on, Enjoy.

25.title: Denny's Toy Claw Machine Vs. Scream Queen Stream
25.plot: Dani Inks find herself extremely frustrating while dumping loads and loads of quarters into a claw machine at Denny's to no avail.

26.title: Bean Boozled Challenge with Red Eye Team
26.plot: Jessica and Heather decide to try the #BeanboozledChallenge with Red Eye Director Tristan Clay and lead actress Destinie Orndoff while together on location in Kentucky filming the in indie horror / slasher.

27.title: American Guinea Pig: Song of Solomon Crew Vs. Bean Boozled
27.plot: The American Guinea Pig: Song of Soloman crew (Director Stephen Biro, FX artist Marcus Koch and DP Chris Hilleke) are convinced by Jessica Cameron AKA JCam to try the #beanboozledchallenge. What amounts is hilarity.

28.title: How We Deal with Depression
28.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff chat with our dear friend and fellow indie actress Emlee Vassilos about depression. Specifically how we deal with depression as actors in the entertainment world. We have all had struggles with this debilitating condition and wanted to talk about it. Sometimes it feels like no one understands what you are going through and we think its important to remember that its actually quite common. We hope that by advising how we handle it - that we can help others.

29.title: Scream Queen Stream LIVE
29.plot: Hosts Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff will entertain you live with their wild antics - drinking games, free prize giveaways to Patrons on Patreon, answer fan questions, chat live, and more.

30.title: Dealing with Depression: Part 2
30.plot: This is part 2 of our Dealing With Depression series. Watch as we talk how we handle it in our own lives and in the entertainment business.

31.title: Days of the Dead Indie Horror Panel and Jcam Prank
31.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

32.title: Dating in LA - Horror Stories and Tips
32.plot: We talk Dating In LA, and specifically some of our dating horror stories with our pal Emlee Vassilos. Join Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff as they discuss some interesting dating stories.

33.title: 20 Questions with Scream Queen Stream
33.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

34.title: Panel at Long Beach Comic Con
34.plot: Centers around the panel "Big Scares, Indie Budgets" from Long Beach Comic con. On the panel our own Jessica Cameron along side Dean Karr (brilliant music video director behind Korn's most recent music video among many others) and the original Wednesday Adams from "The Adams Family", Lisa Loring. The panel was hosted by Ivonna Cadaver with Geek Fest Film Fest. Features your first look at "Kill The PA".

35.title: Easy Guacamole Recipe
35.plot: Watch as Heather Dorff attempts to teach Jessica Cameron how to make her favorite guacamole recipe. Jessica is usually trouble in the kitchen and today was no exception.

36.title: Green Drink Taste Test
36.plot: Watch as Jessica Cameron shares her favorite green drinks with best friends Heather Dorff and Emlee Vassilos. They will try her favorite green juice with apple cider vinegar mixture, her favorite healthy green juice and the best super green smoothie.

37.title: Queen Mary's Dark Harbor Preview
37.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff were lucky to attend the VIP night of Queen Mary's Dark Harbor this year with More Horror's own Jon Weichsel. Watch the fun as they go through horror themed mazes, and attractions and find out what their favorite was.

38.title: ScareLA 2016 Indie Filmmaker Panel
38.plot: This is the video from ScareLA's Indie Filmmaker panel featuring our own Jessica Cameron, with Darren Lynn Bousman (Saw 2-4, Repo. The Genetic opera, The Tension Experience, Abattoir), Gene Blalock (Seraph Films), Andrew Kasch (Tales of Halloween, Never Sleep Again), Mary C. Russell (Carver). Watch as they talk RV Poop stories, practical effects and more! Hosted by Brian Sapir ( We Are Indie Horror).

39.title: A Drunken Halloween
39.plot: Join our own Heather Dorff and Jessica Cameron as they talk Halloween, drinking, and more.

40.title: What Is a Scream Queen
40.plot: This week while at Screamfest and around Los Angeles our own Jessica Cameron asks some people a very important question. - just what is a scream queen?

41.title: All Things Screamfest
41.plot: This October Jessica Cameron, Heather Dorff and Emlee Vassilos attended Screamfest Film Festival in Los Angeles. Find out who the winners were at the festival, and what films were the favorites.

42.title: Cooking with Jessica Cameron - What Kind of Meat Is This?
42.plot: Jessica cooks for Heather and Eric all by herself - but is the food edible or safe? Watch to find out.

43.title: Best Friend Challenge
43.plot: We play the Best friend challenge which is a game going round Youtube in which each best friend answers varies questions to see how well they know each other. Even we were surprised with our own answers.

44.title: 6 AM Day Drinking Challenge
44.plot: We wanted to see what a BAR was like at 6am. Jessica Cameron is joined by some friends including unicorn and All Through the House co-star Natalie Montera at a bar at 6am in Los Angeles to see what its like.

45.title: Egg Russian Roulette Challenge
45.plot: Watch as our girls play a game of Egg Russian Roulette! Who will win? Watch to find out.

46.title: Heather's Bday Unboxing
46.plot: Join us as we watch Heather unwrap her birthday gifts from friends and fans.

47.title: Two Truths and a Lie
47.plot: Join our girls and their good friend Aaron as they play the popular game, Two Truths and a Lie. Play along and see how you score.

48.title: Cooking with JCam: London Edition
48.plot: During her trip to London, Indie film director Damon Rickard attempts to teach Jessica how to make risotto. Featuring a special appearance for The Tour's Tom Gordon.

49.title: Jessica Explores London
49.plot: Our own Jessica Cameron explores London at Christmas time, takes you on a tour while mispronouncing a lot of words. Enjoy.

50.title: Candy Cane Challenge
50.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff do the candy cane challenge just in time for the holidays. This could get dangerous.

51.title: Christmas Gift Unboxing
51.plot: Watch as Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff unwrap their Christmas gifts. Find out what they got each other and from friends and fans.

52.title: Hot Tub New Years Eve Reflections
52.plot: We reflect in a hot tub on the year past and the year upcoming. Watch as we discuss all and more. Special appearance from Solomon Cameron, Jess's dog.

53.title: Truth of the Month from Terry Smith
53.plot: Watch as we answer Terry Smith's TRUTH question, what is our most frightening fan experience?

54.title: International Search for the Best Grilled Cheese
54.plot: Jessica Cameron searches all over the world for the best grilled cheese sand which.

55.title: Hot Tub Story Time: Holiday Horror Stories
55.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff have a hot tub story time - recounting some of their worst Chriistmas experiences ever.

56.title: Lady Vengeance and Dead Right Horror Trivia
56.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff decide to attend Dead Right Horror Trivia and also watch Lady Vengeance.

57.title: Women in Horror Month - Top 10 Women Directed Horror Films
57.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff review their top 10 female directed horror films to celebrate Women in Horror Month.

58.title: Interview with Monique Parent - Part 1
58.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff sit down with iconic indie horror film actress Monique Parent for WIHM, and get her take on all things industry and life. This is a 4 part episode with part 3 view able on Monique's channel.

59.title: Monique Parent Interview - Part 2
59.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff continue their interview with Monique Parent, the thinking man's sex symbol. There's a lot of laughs to be had.

60.title: Interview with Monique Parent - Part 3
60.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff continue their Women in Horror Month interview with Monique Parent.

61.title: Monique Parent Interview Part 4
61.plot: This concludes our interview with the woman who has been labeled "the thinking man's sex symbol", Monique Parent.

62.title: Drunk Valentine's Day Challenge
62.plot: To celebrate Valentines Day and Women In Horror Month, our girls play a fun challenge designed by Heather Dorff.

63.title: Jessica Cameron Birthday Opening
63.plot: Jessica Cameron opens gifts for her birthday from fans and friends.

64.title: WIHM Interview with Arielle Brachfeld
64.plot: We continue our celebration of Women in Horror Month by interviewing the talented Arielle Brachfeld. Enjoy as Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff have some fun with this interview.

65.title: One Year Anniversary
65.plot: We celebrate our 1 year anniversary by including some highlights of our funniest and craziest moments from the past year, all jam packed into one super charged episode. It's been a fun ride and we couldn't do it without our patrons.

66.title: Sephora Tutoril and Adventure
66.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff take their friend Emlee Vassilos to Sephora for the first time to help her 'get started' in a sense on proper makeup do's and don't's as well as help her pick out proper products that match her skin and are easy to use.

67.title: Belko Experiment Interviews with Sean Gunn, Michael Rooker & James Earl
67.plot: Jessica Cameron ventures off to the Belko Experiment premiere where she gets to interview Sean Gunn, Michael Rooker, and James Earl.. much to Heather's chagrin. Enjoy.

68.title: 20 Questions with Lisa Ovies: Part 1
68.plot: We sit down with talented Canadian female horror film director and producer Lisa Ovies and play an interview game of 20 questions.

69.title: 20 Questions with Lisa Ovies: Part 2
69.plot: Its part 2 as we sit down with talented Canadian female horror film director and producer Lisa Ovies and continue our game of 20 questions style interview.

70.title: Hot Tub Storytime: Celebrity Meetings
70.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff tell some of their both good and bad experiences meeting celebrities during a fun hot tub story time session.

71.title: Baby Food Challenge
71.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff along with special quest Lisa Ovies, put their taste bud skills to the test with the baby food challenge. Gagging and disgusted faces ensue.

72.title: Go Kart Racing
72.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff decide to challenge each other to a good old fashioned go kart race. Slamming into walls, wiping people out, and guy's being upset about being defeated by a 'girl' ensue.

73.title: Exploring Berlin
73.plot: Jessica Cameron explores Berlin while we check in with Heather Dorff at home to see what she's up to.

74.title: Never Have I Ever: Part 1
74.plot: Special guest Canadian female horror film director Lisa Ovies play a fun game of 'Never Have I Ever'. Jess has stacked the game against Heather, though, it seems.

75.title: Never Have I Ever: Part 2
75.plot: Jessica Cameron, Heather Dorff, and special guest Canadian female horror film director Lisa Ovies play a fun game of 'Never Have I Ever' - part 2 with an extreme surprise ending.. don't miss it.

76.title: BONUS with Lisa Ovies
76.plot: Check out this bonus episode, a follow up to the cliffhanger ending of 'Never Have I Ever: Part 2' featuring special guest Lisa Ovies.

77.title: Hot Tub Storytime: Alien Encounters
77.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff tell about their family's and personal experiences with possible alien encounters. What do you think? Have you ever seen a UFO / Alien?

78.title: Cooking with Jcam: Chicken & Potatoes
78.plot: Jessica Cameron attempts to make chicken and potatoes, and Heather Dorff will attempt to eat it .

79.title: 20 Questions with Scarepop: Part 1
79.plot: Jess and Heather sit down with the girls of ScarePop and play a fun game of 20 questions.

80.title: 20 Questions with ScarePop: Part 2
80.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff continue their sit down with the girls of ScarePop and play a fun game of 20 questions - part 2.

81.title: The Whip Cream Challenge
81.plot: Jessica Cameron, Heather Dorff, and the girls from Scarepop continue on the fun with a hilarious whip cream challenge. Who will be the winner?!?. Find out.

82.title: Hot Tub Story Time: Our Most Embarrassing Moments
82.plot: Jessica Cameron, Heather Dorff and special guest Canadian horror film director Lisa Ovies describe some of their most embarrassing moments ever while enjoying the hot tub.

83.title: Disneyland Adventures
83.plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff visit the most magical place on earth: Disneyland and record their adventures. Lots of laughs, screams, and getting soaked on rides.

84.title: Faux Dorff: Vegas Adventures
84.plot: We get a chance to here 10 questions and answers from our lovely hosts Jessica and Heather during their drunken adventures in Vegas.

85.title: Beanboozled Challenge with Lisa Ovies
85.plot: Jess and Heather take on the BeanBoozled Challenge once again but this time with some of the lovely crew of Puppet Killer: special guests Lisa Ovies and Rob Phaneuf.

imdb.plot outline: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff are scream queens and best friends who have been tearing up Los Angeles for the last few years with their legendary exploits, which their legions of fans have been rabidly following on social media. Now the dynamic duo of indie horror is set to bring their adventures to an even wider audience through Scream Queen Stream, a brand new variety show that showcases their amazing lives like never before.
imdb.title: Scream Queen Stream
plot: Jessica Cameron and Heather Dorff are scream queens and best friends who have been tearing up Los Angeles for the last few years with their legendary exploits, which their legions of fans have been rabidly following on social media. Now the dynamic duo of indie horror is set to bring their adventures to an even wider audience through _Scream Queen Stream_ (qv), a brand new variety show that showcases their amazing lives like never before.::Jonathan Weichsel
